grid-vs-flexbox.content:
When to use Grid or Flexbox? Let’s compare.

## Step 1: Flexbox for 1D Layouts
Align items in a row or column.

![Flexbox Example](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTh8EUdS96I6-wo_fDl-eqp7w-c53l8ABANtPmLnkvOi1KX2oe5y0zOWKlFgSW6fuTeMIY&usqp=CAU)

## Step 2: Grid for 2D Layouts
Perfect for complex designs.

![Grid Example](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTh8EUdS96I6-wo_fDl-eqp7w-c53l8ABANtPmLnkvOi1KX2oe5y0zOWKlFgSW6fuTeMIY&usqp=CAU)
grid-vs-flexbox.description: When to use Grid or Flexbox? Let’s compare. ## Step 1: Flexbox for 1D Layouts Align items in a row or column. ![Flexbox Example](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTh8EUdS96I6-wo_fDl-eqp7w-c53l8ABANtPmLnkvOi1KX2oe5y0zOWKlFgSW6fuTeMIY&usqp=CAU) ## Step 2: Grid for 2D Layouts Perfect for complex designs. ![Grid Example](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTh8EUdS96I6-wo_fDl-eqp7w-c53l8ABANtPmLnkvOi1KX2oe5y0zOWKlFgSW6fuTeMIY&usqp=CAU)
grid-vs-flexbox.title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox

nextjs-basics.content:
Next.js makes React better. Here’s why.

## Step 1: File-Based Routing
No `react-router` needed!

![Next.js Routing](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTh8EUdS96I6-wo_fDl-eqp7w-c53l8ABANtPmLnkvOi1KX2oe5y0zOWKlFgSW6fuTeMIY&usqp=CAU)

## Step 2: Server-Side Rendering (SSR)
Faster load times, better SEO.

![SSR Example](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTh8EUdS96I6-wo_fDl-eqp7w-c53l8ABANtPmLnkvOi1KX2oe5y0zOWKlFgSW6fuTeMIY&usqp=CAU)
nextjs-basics.description: Next.js makes React better. Here’s why. ## Step 1: File-Based Routing No `react-router` needed! ![Next.js Routing](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTh8EUdS96I6-wo_fDl-eqp7w-c53l8ABANtPmLnkvOi1KX2oe5y0zOWKlFgSW6fuTeMIY&usqp=CAU) ## Step 2: Server-Side Rendering (SSR) Faster load times, better SEO. ![SSR Example](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTh8EUdS96I6-wo_fDl-eqp7w-c53l8ABANtPmLnkvOi1KX2oe5y0zOWKlFgSW6fuTeMIY&usqp=CAU)
nextjs-basics.title: Getting Started with Next.js
